functions.title: Create Simple Player
functions.description: Create player view in a layout with basic controls.

functions.title: Create Styled Player
functions.description: Create player view in a layout with extra controls like toggle captions, track selection etc.

functions.title: Show System UI
functions.description: Can be used to exit fullscreen. The function is in experimental phase and may not work properly.

functions.title: Hide System UI
functions.description: Can be used to enter fullscreen. The function is in experimental phase and may not work properly.

events.title: On Fullscreen Changes
events.description: Event raised when fullscreen button is clicked and its status changes. Here you can perform different functions to enter or exit fullscreen.

events.title: On Visibility Changes
events.description: Event raised when controls visibility changes. Here you can update your UI. For example : You can show/hide a title label etch.

properties.title: Use Artwork
properties.description: Set whether to show an image when playing an audio file.

properties.title: Default Thumbnail
properties.description: Set default thumbnail in case if there is no thumbnail in media metadata, the player will show this thumbnail. It works only for audio files.

properties.title: Repeat Mode
properties.description: Set repeat toggle modes. This will show/hide repeat toggle button.

properties.title: Show Loading
properties.description: Set when to show loading progress indicator.

properties.title: Resize Mode
properties.description: Set video resize mode.

properties.title: Auto Show Controller
properties.description: Automatically show controller when media is interupted during playback.

properties.title: Controller Timeout
properties.description: Milliseconds after which the controller should hide automatically.

properties.title: Hide On Touch
properties.description: Automatically hide controller on touch.

properties.title: Use Controller
properties.description: Whether to use default controller or not.

properties.title: Animation Enabled
properties.description: Enable/Disable controls animation.

properties.title: Thumb Size
properties.description: Thumb size when slider is visible but is not being dragged.

properties.title: Active Thumb Size
properties.description: Thumb size when slider is being dragged by the user.

properties.title: Disabled Thumb Size
properties.description: Thumb size when slider is disabled.

properties.title: Track Color
properties.description: Track color.

properties.title: Buffered Color
properties.description: Buffered track color.

properties.title: Progress Color
properties.description: Track progress color.

properties.title: Subtitles Background Color
properties.description: Set background color for subtitles.

properties.title: Subtitles Foreground Color
properties.description: Set text or foreground color for subtitles.

properties.title: Subtitles Edge Color
properties.description: Set edge color for subtitles. I am not quite sure what it does, so you can experiment with this to find out more about it.

properties.title: Subtitles Window Color
properties.description: Set color for whole subtitle layout.

properties.title: Text Size Type
properties.description: Specify how you want to scale subtitles font size.

params.name: TextSizeTypeAbsolute
params.description: if you want to set a specific font size irrespective of the player size

params.name: TextSizeTypeFractional
params.description: if you want to set font size relative the player size

properties.title: Absolute Text Size
properties.description: set a specific font size for subtitles irrespective of the player size.

properties.title: Fractional Text Size
properties.description: Set font size for subtitles relative the player size.

properties.title: Subtitle Render View Type
properties.description: Specify what type of view to use for rendering subtitles.

params.name: ViewTypeWeb
params.description: This will use CSS and HTML styling to render the subtitles.

properties.title: Subtitle Bottom Padding
properties.description: Set bottom padding for subtitle.

properties.title: Ignore Bottom Padding
properties.description: Whether to ignore bottom padding or not.

properties.title: Subtitles Typeface
properties.description: Specify a custom font for subtitles.
